0: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” The San Francisco home featured in television's "Full House" is now available to rent for $13,950 a month. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The San Francisco Chronicle reports (http://bit.ly/2c2A3Qq ) the 1883 villa was put on the market in May with a $4.15 million price tag, but it didn't sell. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The home's exterior, then painted white, was used as the Tanner family's residence in the original show. Inside scenes were filmed on a set in Burbank, California.
